overview: The self confident gambler Joebell, in an attempt to escape the drudgery of life in Trinidad, schemes to find his way to the promise and fantasy of America. Each step of his journey uncovers him to himself and his island he had never really seen.  A poignant tale of love, ambition and self-discovery.
tagline: Joebell catching hell in Trinidad so he make up his mind to go. The place he choose is America...
title: Joebell And America
